description: The Red Maple (Acer rubrum 'Franksred' RED SUNSET) is an amazing species of tree. It is a fast-growing deciduous tree that is renowned for its distinctive red fall foliage and its red twig tips in winter. Its spreading horizontal branches create a soft, rounded form that makes it an ideal specimen tree in gardens and landscapes. Itâ€™s also drought tolerant and popular for its striking red buds and flowers in spring. In fall, its three-lobed, bright green leaves turn vibrant red, setting any landscape ablaze with beauty. Once established, it is very tolerant of most conditions, making it an ideal choice for gardeners needing year-round beauty and blooms.
